page.title: 03COUNCIL FOR ELY
page.content: On Monday morning June 17th we went to see the Chairman of the County Council and it was in Newport Road.When we got there we parked the mini buses and we got out and we had to line up,one line with boys and the other line with girls.After we had lined up we went in to the building it was a big building. We went in this room and it was full of chairs and the Chairmans chair was there.Brett Hanlon sat in the Chairmans chair and we were asking questions and after that we went up to the eleventh floor.We went up by lift it only took about one minute. After we went up we had a little tea party because Miss Gill was leaving. After we had the tea party we had to go and before we went he gave us a card and said good_bye and we went back to school. cont.
